name: Dagon: Hell Below
description:
Scientists keep searching for the origin of life outside our planet but... what if the answer to those questions might be found inside the deepest of our oceans?

Right after World War II, the remnants of the battle reveal something inside the water. You're sent to investigate the wreckage of it, in an ancient area forgotten by humankind that has only seen the death of so many in recent years. Will you be able to withstand what you encounter?.

Dagon: Hell Below is a 15 min DEMO for the HPS1 Summer of shivers gamejam, made in Unity by @sickman_art (Art and Sound) and @yipidev (Design and Scripting). The game will be updated  before Christmas with more content and areas to explore
